verbose_text: In order to identify all potential kinases that phosphorylate Ephexin5 at N-terminal serine residues 107 and 109, we developed an in vitro biochemical assay using immobilized purified GST-Ephexin5, in combination with ATP, reaction buffer, and lysate from P5 mouse brain as a source of kinase activity (XREF_FIG).
evidence: phosphorylate Ephexin5 at N-terminal serine residues 107 and 109
